name: getRbsHostInfo
description: Get the details of the Rubrik Backup Service (RBS) installed on a specific host. Specify the details of the host to check whether RBS is installed on the host or not. If RBS is installed, the response will include the RBS details.

name.description: IP address or hostname of the host.

username.description: Name of the user account that has sudo/admin privileges on the RBS host. This is required to install/uninstall/upgrade RBS packages on the RBS host.

password.description: Password associated with the username that has access to the host.

operation_timeout.description: Number of seconds after which the operation is terminated if it has not completed execution. Default value is 600 seconds.

$ul: **agentId**: UUID that uniquely identifies the Rubrik Backup Service on the Rubrik cluster.
**agentVersion**: Version of the Rubrik Backup Service.
**name**: IP address or hostname of the host.
**osInfo**: Version of the operating system that the host is running.
**osType**: Type of the operating system that the host is running.
**status**: The status of the Rubrik Backup Service on the host.
